name: Risen Reaver
description: A large, grotesque undead creature wearing studded leather armor, possessing a bladed fist and a terrifying presence.
memorable: The ability to absorb nonmagical melee weapons enhances its combat capabilities and adds a layer of strategy.
goals: To relentlessly pursue and eliminate living foes.
relations: Often encountered alongside other undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in battlefields or areas with a high presence of death.
strengths: High durability and strength, exceptional mobility, ability to detect life nearby.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, wisdom, and charisma, limiting strategic options.
attacks: Multiattack with three melee strikes using a bladed fist, dealing considerable slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Infused Arsenal allows it to absorb weapons and gain immunity to damage types from those weapons for enhanced attacks.
senses: Possesses Blood Sense, allowing it to detect living creatures within 60 feet and track them up to a mile away.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, though its perception score is average.
additional_information: Absorbs a weapon if hit by a nonmagical melee attack.
Can adapt its damage type based on absorbed weapons.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to Undead Nature.
Extremely mobile with the Skitter ability to dash.
Can absorb up to three nonmagical weapons every 24 hours.
test_queries: large undead creature with weapon absorption
formidable melee attacker that tracks blood
chaotic evil undead with slashing attacks
undead monster that absorbs melee weapons
